title: Login issue
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still can't access it.

title: Payment failure
description: Customer attempted to pay using Visa ending 1234 but the payment keeps failing despite sufficient balance.

title: Password reset not working
description: User is not receiving password reset emails and cannot log in to their account.

title: Website loading slowly
description: Pages take too long to load for the customer, affecting usability. Customer is unable to log in to their account.

title: Missing order details
description: Customer cannot see recent purchases in their order history.

title: App crash on startup
description: Mobile app crashes immediately after the customer opens it.

title: Incorrect billing amount
description: Customer was charged twice for the same order and requests a refund.

title: Feature request: Dark Mode
description: Customer requested a dark mode option for better usability at night.

title: Email notifications not received
description: Customer reports that they are not getting any emails after placing orders.

title: Dashboard data outdated
description: Customer notices analytics dashboard is showing old data even after refreshing.
